mapper.insert: INSERT INTO newscate (newscateno, genre, name, cnt, seqno, visible, rdate, newscategrpno) VALUES (newscate_seq.nextval, #{genre}, #{name}, #{cnt}, #{seqno}, #{visible}, sysdate, #{newscategrpno})
mapper.update: UPDATE newscate SET genre = #{genre}, name = #{name}, cnt = #{cnt}, seqno = #{seqno}, visible = #{visible}, newscategrpno = #{newscategrpno}, rdate = sysdate WHERE newscateno = #{newscateno}
mapper.select: SELECT newscateno, genre, name, cnt, seqno, visible, rdate, newscategrpno FROM newscate ORDER BY seqno ASC
